mbuild.plugins.mask module¶

mbuild.plugins.mask.apply_mask(host, guest, mask, guest_port_name='port', backfill=None)[source]¶

Attach guest Compounds to a host Compound in the pattern of a mask.

mbuild.plugins.mask.disk_mask(n)[source]¶
mbuild.plugins.mask.grid_mask_2d(n, m)[source]¶
mbuild.plugins.mask.grid_mask_3d(n, m, l)[source]¶
mbuild.plugins.mask.random_mask_2d(num_sites)[source]¶
mbuild.plugins.mask.random_mask_3d(num_sites)[source]¶
mbuild.plugins.mask.sphere_mask(N)[source]¶

Generate N evenly distributed points on the unit sphere.

Sphere is centered at the origin. Alrgorithm based on the ‘Golden Spiral’.

Code by Chris Colbert from the numpy-discussion list: http://mail.scipy.org/pipermail/numpy-discussion/2009-July/043811.html
